Name: Speyside Cocktail
Ingredients: 22.5 ml De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
MUDDLE grapes in base of shaker.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Scotch, grape juice, apricot liqueur and grapefruit may seem an unlikely combo but they get on well together.
History: Discovered in 2004 (originally named Speyside Martini) at Indigo Yard, Edinburgh, Scotland.
